actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to increase the earnings limit, and for other purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide, through adjustments in the monthly exempt amount, for increases in the amounts of allowable earnings under the social security earnings limit for individuals who have attained retirement age. Subjects such increased amounts to current law cost-of-living adjustment after 2002.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to increase the earnings limit, and for other purposes.
